entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 02:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
